ygData.subject: WWF (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: One of my friends sent me this and I had to pass it on to you all.  BTW, I DO NOT watch WWF ;) Infinity Tonight while watching WCW Nitro on the Superstation
ygData.messageBody:
One of my friends sent me this and I had to pass it on to you all. BTW, I DO NOT watch WWF ;)

Infinity

Tonight while watching WCW Nitro on the Superstation (Cable), I started
laughing. Not just at the typical sardonics of the night's actions, or the
fact I was actually watching it (typically it's running in the background).
But this moment I was actually watching it. In the 3rd row, left side from
their central camera angle, there was a man holding up a sign. Blue shirt,
glasses? Anyway, everyone and their uncle holds up a sign. But this one was
"I logged out of EverQuest for This".
